title: ​The russians Are Forcing Ukrainian Kids in Mariupol to Design and Manufacture Drones for the russian Military | Defense Express
text: The 47th school in the temporarily occupied Mariupol is set to design and manufacture drones for the russian military. To support this initiative, the occupiers have established a specialized engineering class with a focus on aviation, as part of Vladimir Putin’s “Education” program, National Resistance Center of Ukraine [reports](https://sprotyv.mod.gov.ua/bezpilotnyky-dlya-svo-budut-vygotovlyaty-u-shkolah-tymchasovo-okupovanogo-mariupolya/). This is not the first instance of russian authorities exploiting children in temporarily occupied Ukrainian territories to produce weapons that ultimately harm Ukrainians and devastate cities. The Kremlin has distributed textbooks on unmanned aerial systems and supplied schools in these territories, produced by russian Geoscan drone manufacturer and the Prosveshchenie publishing house. Read more:[The UK Defense Intelligence: russia Launches Military Training for Schoolchildren Amidst New Youth Strategy] A whole generation of Ukrainian youth is witnessing this militarization, which fosters the false notion that the war instigated by russia is a normal occurrence.
